answers.author: Toni Shope
answers.text:
Hi Bonnie. You might want to check with Washoe County. I know it's much larger organization but great example of reducing costs, partnerships, and national recongition for their low euthanasia rates.

answers.author: Jerene Watson
answers.text:
Check with the Town of Oro Valley, AZ (520-229-4700)  if you want some research.  They may have found sample budgets from other cities in their research  - it idid not prove cost effective to transition from the County to the Town.  
(Kevin Burke is the staff member I believe who could provide that information).

author: Bonnie Svrcek
text: We are considering operating our own animal shelter.  I need some samples of budgets for such services.  Any help would be greatly appreciated!
title: ANIMAL SHELTER SERVICES
